main_definition: To start to be something or someone, usually after a change or development.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Transformed into another state or condition
Changed from one thing to another, often gradually
meanings_and_examples.example: She became more confident in her abilities over time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Adopted a new status or role
meanings_and_examples.example: He became the president of the company last year.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Was developed into something else, often as a result of growth or change
meanings_and_examples.example: The small town became a thriving city over time.
